sentence.Network_en: There has also been reciprocal influence between Sanskrit and the Dravidian languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 梵语和德拉威语也是相互影响.

sentence.Network_en: Ethnic Composition: a mixture of Sinhalese, Dravidian, Arab and Black.
sentence.Network_cn: 民族: (斯里兰卡)僧伽罗人 、 (印度的)达罗毗荼人 、 阿拉伯人和黑人的混合民族.

sentence.Network_en: Each region adapted the script of the local vernacular, whether Indo - Aryan or Dravidian.
sentence.Network_cn: 每种宗教都使用本国当地的文献, 不管印度雅利安人还是德拉威人.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of one of the aboriginal races of India (pushed south by Caucasians and now mixed with them)
2. a large family of languages spoken in south and central India and Sri Lanka

auth_sentence.content: The Dravidian languages...have left behind them a solitary outpost in the Brahui.
